publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-608 Mr Gil Paterson: Theory on Rape—That the Parliament condemns the claims of the book A Natural History of Rape, The Biological Bases of Sexual Coercion which excuses rape as a simple mating technique; finds the conclusions of this book deeply offensive to both women and men; strongly believes that the theory which forms the basis of this publication, that human males have evolved the desire to rape whenever their desire to mate is thwarted, is both dangerous and deeply flawed and calls upon the Scottish Executive to take action to ensure that the theory promoted through this publication is not adopted as a defence against the charge of rape. Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S1M-608 Theory on Rape (lodged on 29 February 2000) Ms Sandra White*, Shona Robison*
S1M-608 Theory on Rape (lodged on 29 February 2000) Colin Campbell*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*

S1M-608 Mr Gil Paterson: Theory on Rape—That the Parliament condemns the claims of the book A Natural History of Rape, The Biological Bases of Sexual Coercion which excuses rape as a simple mating technique; finds the conclusions of this book deeply offensive to both women and men; strongly believes that the theory which forms the basis of this publication, that human males have evolved the desire to rape whenever their desire to mate is thwarted, is both dangerous and deeply flawed and calls upon the Scottish Executive to take action to ensure that the theory promoted through this publication is not adopted as a defence against the charge of rape. Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill, Ms Sandra White, Shona Robison, Colin Campbell, Mrs Margaret Ewing
S1M-608 Theory on Rape (lodged on 29 February 2000) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-608 Theory on Rape (lodged on 29 February 2000) Robin Harper*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-608 Theory on Rape (lodged on 29 February 2000) Irene McGugan*

Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill, Ms Sandra White, Shona Robison, Colin Campbell, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Andrew Wilson, Robin Harper, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Irene McGugan, Alex Neil*, Donald Gorrie*
